attributes.action: The Government and Public should be more aware of community cohesion in schools
attributes.background: As part of our GCSE citizenship coursework we have been asked to find out more about cultural diversity and racism in schools. we see this as an important issue in the local community aswell as the U.K.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
